title: Commit Hebrew library name mapping fix
description: Stage and commit the Hebrew library name support changes

inputs.knownIssue: RTL directionality issue: In Hebrew UI mode, labels with colons (e.g., 'ספרייה:', 'אוסף:') display with incorrect text direction - the colon appears at the beginning of the string instead of the end due to missing dir='rtl' attribute on dialog elements.
